csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="in-text"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <sort>
      <key variable="issued" />
      <key variable="title" />
    </sort>
    <layout delimiter="; " prefix="" suffix=".">
      <group delimiter=", ">
        <text variable="title" />
        <choose>
          <if variable="issued">
            <date variable="issued">
              <date-part name="year" />
            </date>
          </if>
        </choose>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
result: Book D, 1999; Book B, 2000; Book A; Book C; Book E.
